Conversations/Bank/Adeline/Market Lines/: [Ari], you're not really thinking of spending your tesserae at Wheedle's booth, are you?
Everyone in this town is essential to keeping Mistria running smoothly. Except for Wheedle, I have no idea what he does.
My parents apparently knew Wheedle... my mother used to shoo him off with a broom. I should find that broom...
Nora says Wheedle's business helps advance the economic recovery of Mistria... I guess so? Pretty sure Wheedle's only worried about his own economic recovery.
Conversations/Bank/Balor/Market Lines/sc: I've done business with a lot of shady characters in my time. But even I won't cut a deal with Wheedle.
Conversations/Bank/Celine/Market Lines/m: [Ari], come here, come here! You're my lucky charm... which chest should I pick? Middle? Right? Left? It's got to be one of those...
Today's the day, [Ari]! There's something in the air. I'm going to win Wheedle's game this time!
I'm feeling lucky, [Ari]... it's got to be the chest on the left.
You don't suppose this game is rigged, do you [Ari]? That would be so unscrupulous... I guess Wheedle doesn't exactly look scrupulous...
Conversations/Bank/Dell/Market Lines/mar: I'm banned from playing Wheedle's game, but for different reasons than Maple... Wheedle says you're only allowed to open one of the chests. HA! Try and STOP ME!
If you want my advice, [Ari], you should open all the chests while Wheedle's not looking. Mom says I can get away with it because I'm a kid... but I believe in you, [Ari]!
Wheedle does NOT like me, on account of I don't pay him any money and I open all his treasure chests for fun.
Conversations/Bank/Eiland/Market Lines/m: Balor says the prizes in Wheedle's game might be ancient artifacts... it can't hurt to put some of the museum's budget towards, ah, acquisition.
I was so close! I should have stuck with the middle chest, but Wheedle kept asking me if I was sure...
Games similar to Wheedle's are recounted in many ancient records... usually with a lot of colorful language. Sometimes history IS written by the losers...
I lost Wheedle's game again, [Ari]... you don't suppose it's rigged, do you?
Conversations/Bank/Elsie/Market Lines/ma: Wheedle's game is delightful, [Ari]... we never had anything like this back in the Capital.
I do so love these entertaining country games... just imagine, hiding three things in three boxes! And you don't know what they are! The mystery is delicious.
Something about Wheedle's smile is a little alluring, don't you agree [Ari]? Or is it just me?
Wheedle seems immune to my charms... I will discover the secret of his little treasure game, just you wait!
Conversations/Bank/Errol/Market Lines/ma: [Ari], do you see this? If you pay Wheedle a fixed amount, you can win great prizes. I do enjoy great prizes...
Landen and I have very different approaches to Wheedle's treasure game... he listens to lady luck, whilst my approach is more... cerebral.
Today's winnings are... a squid, a tomato, and another, larger squid. What am I going to do with all these squids...?
Hush, I'm concentrating [Ari]... I'm watching for Wheedle's tells. Which are quite difficult to suss out when he's always smiling in the same, unsettling way.
Conversations/Bank/Hayden/Market Lines/m: Sometimes I help Wheedle set up his booth, and [Ari]... you wouldn't believe the noises that come out of those treasure chests. What's he got in there, anyway?
I used to enjoy playing Wheedle's treasure chest game, but then I started hauling those treasure chests around for him... now I know too much.
I was carrying the treasure chests in for Wheedle this morning, and one of them laughed at me! Brrr, gave me the chills.
I always thought Valen was a little stiff, but she gets a kick out of Wheedle's game. Who would've thought!
Conversations/Bank/Hemlock/Market Lines/: I've won a little something in Wheedle's treasure game a few times, but never anything to write home about. Well, maybe today's the day.
I once saw someone get a chair out of one of Wheedle's treasure chests... how did he even get it in there?
I won a bale of hay from Wheedle's treasure game... I wonder if Hayden's around. He likes hay, right?
Josie says she's going to win big today... I'm rooting for her!
Conversations/Bank/Holt/Market Lines/mar: Nora said I should try skipping through the meadow instead of spending my money at Wheedle's. I don't see how that's going to fix my gamboling problem.
I think Wheedle might be a vampire, [Ari]. He always gets nervous when I raise the stakes.
I won an antique clock with no hands... it's a timeless treasure!
I got a strawberry out of one of Wheedle's prize chests! Now that's what I call berried treasure!
Conversations/Bank/Josephine/Market Line: I know I shouldn't play Wheedle's game, but it's the Saturday Market... what's wrong with a bit of fun?
Has Reina been around? She'll be mad if she sees me playing Wheedle's treasure game...
Have you tried Wheedle's treasure game, [Ari]? Don't be shy, it's fun!
Ooh, I shouldn't play Wheedle's treasure game, but it's just so tempting! Okay, just once!
Conversations/Bank/Juniper/Market Lines/: Try Wheedle's little game, [Ari]. Not that you'll win... I just enjoy watching people lose.
March played Wheedle's game earlier... it took him a losing streak of five before he walked away. A shame... I almost convinced him to sell his anvil.
I don't play Wheedle's game... the real game is settling in with a glass of wine to watch the rubes get conned. Speaking of which... don't be shy, [Ari].
I enjoy watching people lose Wheedle's game, but I've never talked to the man. Do you see that face? No thanks.
Conversations/Bank/Landen/Market Lines/m: Today's the big day, [Ari]... I can feel it in my bones! Lucky number two... or was it three?
Errol and I developed a strategy... we each take our bets, and pool our winnings! We got a cabbage, two flowers I don't recognize, and a couch. How're we gonna split a couch?
No dice today, [Ari]... but Wheedle better watch out. Next time's MY time!
I spent all my grocery money on Wheedle's game, and ended up with thirty potatoes. Sometimes things just work out... I sure do hope Ryis likes potatoes.
Conversations/Bank/Luc/Market Lines/mark: Wheedle is the only adult we don't call Mister... it feels too respectful, somehow.
I'm here as Pa's chaperone... Reina says Pa isn't allowed to hand Wheedle a single coin.
Ma said Pa can't spend any money at Wheedle's booth, but I saw her playing earlier...
[Ari], as a little kid who doesn't know much about the world... are you really going to play Wheedle's game? It is NOT a sound financial decision.
Conversations/Bank/Maple/Market Lines/ma: I'm banned from playing Wheedle's treasure chest game, [Ari]... I guess I won too much.
I know Wheedle's scam... Mister Balor told me all about it. That's why Wheedle banned me... coward.
When I'm a princess, Wheedle will be BANISHED... double banished. #TRIPLE BANISHED!# For the crime of #BEING A FRAUD!#
Mister Balor says I should sell tips to win Wheedle's game... but don't get too excited... I'm retired.
Conversations/Bank/March/Market Lines/ma: Just watch, [Ari]... I'm going to show all these losers how it's done.
Out of the way, [Ari]... I'm going to get Wheedle's prizes before you hog them all for yourself.
I won... a trout. Why was Wheedle keeping a trout in his treasure chest? How did he keep the water in there?
I spent a hundred tesserae to get... one ear of corn? No, you can't have it.
Conversations/Bank/Nora/Market Lines/mar: [Ari], I know I approved Wheedle's booth at the Saturday Market, but... maybe you'd be better off spending your money somewhere else.
Every Saturday Market needs a shady vendor with questionable practices, but... I certainly wouldn't spend my money at Wheedle's.
[Ari], do you think it's okay that Wheedle's at the Saturday Market? I guess people do actually win things... sometimes...
Holt is allowed to try Wheedle's treasure game exactly once per market. I've seen what happens when that man gets out of control. And don't even get me started on Dell...
Conversations/Bank/Olric/Market Lines/ma: I love Wheedle's treasure game... he says you can win prizes, but honestly I just love opening boxes.
I won a super rare sword from Wheedle's treasure game! March looked super annoyed when it happened, so I gave it to him.
I got a rare fishing rod, a super rare sword, and a SUPER rare watering can from Wheedle's treasure game. Three in a row! Wheedle looked annoyed... he should be happy for me, bro.
Wheedle banned me from his game because I kept winning all the best stuff... aw. Well, I'll always have the memories. And all this super rare loot!
Conversations/Bank/Reina/Market Lines/ma: The thing about Wheedle is, he's... (pulls a face)
What do I think of Wheedle? Well... (pulls a face)
If I had sum up my thoughts on Wheedle, it would be... (pulls a face)
Conversations/Bank/Ryis/Market Lines/mar: Game looks fun, but Wheedle... bad vibes, [Ari]. Not super bad... like, medium bad.
Not one to judge, but... why's Wheedle gotta smile like that? Brrr.
March is a little obsessed with the treasure chest game... well, he's having fun. I think.
Birds always fly away when Wheedle's around. What's up with that?
Conversations/Bank/Terithia/Market Lines: I know the house always wins, [Ari]... but I'm in it for the thrill!
Don't bet what you can't lose, [Ari]... because Wheedle will take it!
I recognize Wheedle's racket... we used to play shell games and three card monte on the ship, back during the open sea doldrums.
I won a mackerel from Wheedle's treasure game... but I've got plenty of fish already. Suppose I could throw it back in the ocean.
Conversations/Bank/Valen/Market Lines/ma: What a fun little game Wheedle's got set up here. Will you try, [Ari]?
Hayden was surprised I liked Wheedle's game so much... do I seem that straight-laced, [Ari]?
The prize was in the other box! How delightful!
It's simply an observation, but I've noticed Juniper really enjoys watching me lose...
Conversations/Bank/Wheedle/Gift Lines/gi: Well now! It's not every day someone gives me something for nothing, even on my birthday!
Is this a regift? No, don't answer... I understand. I'll find a use for it.
Why [Ari], how did you know? There's nothing I like more than a wheed.
Oh, yes, I can always use something like this.
Yes, yes, very good. One can never have enough of something as nice as this! Into my collection it goes!
Yes, yes, this is a fine gift indeed. What's the going rate for this, anyway?
I know quality goods when I see them. And I'm seeing them!
My my, this is just the thing. And for me? Delightful!
But it doesn't hurt to butter me up with great stuff like this.
You'll always get the best deal from your old pal, Wheedle!
For me? My my... I could never regift such perfection.
Cutscenes/Heart Events/Balor/balor_six_h: Which is to say, the one that makes him the most money.
Checking in on your pal's Balor decision? Don't worry, I'm sure he'll make the right call.
